SelectAllTextWhenFocused: Whether to select all text when the user clicks to give focus on the widget
ClearTextSelectionOnFocusLoss: Whether to clear text selection when focus is lost
RevertTextOnEscape: Whether to allow the user to back out of changes when they press the escape key
ClearKeyboardFocusOnCommit: Whether to clear keyboard focus when pressing enter to commit changes
AllowContextMenu: Whether the context menu can be opened
VirtualKeyboardOptions: Additional options for the virtual keyboard
VirtualKeyboardDismissAction: What action should be taken when the virtual keyboard is dismissed?
OnTextChanged: Called whenever the text is changed programmatically or interactively by the user
OnTextCommitted: Called whenever the text is committed.  This happens when the user presses enter or the text box loses focus.
bIsReadOnly: Sets the Text as Readonly to prevent it from being modified interactively by the user

methods.name: GetHintText
methods.doc: Returns the Hint text that appears when there is no text in the text box

methods.name: GetText
methods.doc:
Gets the widget text
@return The widget text

methods.name: SetHintText
methods.doc:
Sets the Hint text that appears when there is no text in the text box
@param InHintText The text that appears when there is no text in the text box

methods.name: SetIsReadOnly
methods.doc: Sets the Text as Readonly to prevent it from being modified interactively by the user

methods.name: SetText
methods.doc:
Directly sets the widget text.
@param InText The text to assign to the widget
